entry.title: A cancel fling still triggers the navigation in 3-button mode.
entry.content:
- Add loggings in `TabOnBackGestureHandler::OnBackProgressed` and `TabOnBackGestureHandler::OnBackInvoked`. - Land on buzzfeed.com from google.com serp page. - Start to swipe from the left edge of the screen and move the finger to ~70% of the screen. - Do a fast left-fling. - I can see OnGestureProgressed being called from progress=0.7 all the way to progress=0 to reflect the fling, but then OnGestureInvoked is also called to start the navigation.
Lijin, this seems to be buggy, (IIUC) as in 3-button mode we decide on whether to start the navigation (i.e., call OnGestureInvoked) based on where the user lifts the finger. In the fling case since we receive OnGestureProgressed with progress=0, I'd imagine Clank thinks the user lift the finger almost at the left edge thus not to start the navigation. Would you be able to confirm if this is an existing bug?

entry.title: Merge profiling data from multiple reps
Dragging next to the settings icon shows a 'dragging' cursor but can't be dragged
entry.content:
Chrome Version : 124.0.6315.0 (Official Build) canary (arm64) OS : macOS Version 14.2 (Build 23C64)
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open DevTools 2. Hover right next to the settings icon 3. Click and drag to resize DevTools
What is the expected result? Either no cursor or it allows you to drag
What happens instead? The arrow cursor shows up but when attempting to drag, nothing happens.

entry.title: Port gesture nav mode gesture logics to
entry.content:
In gesture nav mode, a user's intention to start or to abort the navigation is calculated based off how the user swipes across the screen (start the nav for a right swipe and not start the nav for a left swipe). In 3-button mode, the intention is based on where the user lifts the finger.
This can lead to some subtle bugs in 3-button mode (e.g., https://b.corp.google.com/issues/326850774#comment5, do a left-fling in the "invoke region"). We should consider to port the gesture nav logic into 3-button mode.

entry.title: Fatal error in Type cast failed in CAST(LoadFromObject(machine_type, object, IntPtrConstant(off
entry.content:
Detailed Report: https://clusterfuzz.com/testcase?key=5080847941566464
Fuzzer: None Job Type: linux_asan_d8_dbg Platform Id: linux
Crash Type: Fatal error Crash Address: Crash State: Type cast failed in CAST(LoadFromObject(machine_type, object, IntPtrConstant(off v8::internal::CheckObjectType Builtins_FastNewObject
Sanitizer: address (ASAN)
Regressed: https://clusterfuzz.com/revisions?job=linux_asan_d8_dbg&range=91986:91987
Reproducer Testcase: https://clusterfuzz.com/download?testcase_id=5080847941566464
Issue filed automatically.
To reproduce this, please build the target in this report and run it against the reproducer testcase. Please use the GN arguments provided at bottom of this report when building the binary.
If you have trouble reproducing, please also export the environment variables listed under "[Environment]" in the crash stacktrace.
If you have any feedback on reproducing test cases, let us know at https://forms.gle/Yh3qCYFveHj6E5jz5 so we can improve.

entry.title: DevTools storage_test.ts is failing after a back-end update
entry.content:
After an update in chromium (crrev.com/c/5315547) the storage_test.ts ("The Application tab contains a Storage pane which reports storage correctly, including the pie chart legend") is failing.
There are two tests that are running, and the second one is only failing if the first one has been run previously. Both create a database and add an array object to the storage. However, the second time, the quota doesn't show up in the pie chart legend.
Since this looks more like a front-end issue and since it's blocking autorollers, I'll disable it for now and investigate further.

Actual Result : Under chrome://settings/languages there's no gap between the sentence "Let websites know the languages.........." and " Add Languages" button
Expected Result : Under chrome://settings/languages there should be a certain gap between the sentence "Let websites know the languages.........." and "Add Languages" button
This is a regression issue broken in M-123
Good Build : 123.0.6298.0 (Revision: 1259633) Bad Build : 123.0.6299.0 (Revision: 1259817 )
Actual Result: Attached beolow
Expected Result: Attached beolow
Note : 1. Unable to repro with English (USA) display language 2. Unable to repro the issue on mac 3. Will provide bisect info soon
Thank You..!!!!

entry.title: Move internals API state into a tab panel
entry.content: The API state is effectively constant and is unlikely to be referenced more than once during use of the internals UI, but it currently takes up valuable vertical space. We can move it into a tab panel instead.

entry.title: Screenshot add possibility for delay
entry.content:
This is a feature request.
Motivation: Be able to add a delay for 3 or 5 sec before taking a screenshot so the dev can move/interact with some elements with the mouse and not be stuck with a "static" screenshot with no user interaction.
Solution: Add time to the right of "screenshot", 0s, 3s, 5s, taping the time cycles the time

entry.title: CSP-report reports wrong blocked-uri on redirect
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Content-Security-Policy that has domain A.com in allowlist but doesn't have domain B.com 2. requesting A.com, A.com returns 302 and redirects to B.com 3. the report will show A.com in "blocked uri" even though A.com is in allow list
# Problem Description The issue makes it impossible to know why a request got blocked and what domain is actually missing from the allowlist as only the first uri in the redirect chain is reported regardless on which step in the redirect chain was blocked by csp and which uri was actually causing the block
# Additional Comments first 2 screenshots are the request, third is the report body
# Summary CSP-report reports wrong blocked-uri on redirect
# Custom Questions #### Which component does this fall under? Blink>SecurityFeature
#### Does this work in other browsers? Not sure - I don't know
# Additional Data Category: API \ Chrome Channel: Stable \ Regression: N/A

entry.title: Regression: Able to drop any file type(Ex. Doc, exe, txt, PNG, JPEG etc.) into the HTML5 terminal even after blocking the sites in 'chrome://settings/cookies'
entry.content:
Chrome Version: Ash-chrome M123 Dev 123.0.6276.0/15770.0.0 on kappa(jacuzzi) device Lacros Version:Lacros Beta 123.0.6312.4 [Lacros only] OS: Chrome
Details: 1)Accounts: Test account 2)Enterprise Enrolled:NO 3)Devices: A)Non-Corp devices - kappa(jacuzzi) device -arm64/lacros32 4)Repro on Ash-chrome: yes, 123.0.6276.0 5)Mode: Normal mode 6)Frequency: Always
Enabled the lacros flags: #lacros-stability = Beta #lacros-only = Enabled
What steps will reproduce the problem? ------------ 1. Launch chrome, open NTP and navigate to 'chrome://settings/cookies' 2. Add 'https://html5-filesystem-terminal.glitch.me/' under the 'Block/Sites that can never use cookies' section 3. Navigate to https://html5-filesystem-terminal.glitch.me/ to open the HTML5 terminal present on the page. 4. Drag and drop any file type(Ex. Doc, exe, txt, PNG, JPEG etc.) into the HTML5 terminal.
Verification: ------------- 1. Should able to navigate to 'chrome://settings/cookies'. 2. Should able to add the test url in 'Block/Sites that can never use cookies' section. 3. Should able to navigate to test url containing HTML5 terminal. 4. Should not able to drop any file type(Ex. Doc, exe, txt, PNG, JPEG etc.) into the HTML5 terminal.
What is the expected result? Should not able to drop any file type(Ex. Doc, exe, txt, PNG, JPEG etc.) into the HTML5 terminal.
What happens instead? Observed Able to drop any file type(Ex. Doc, exe, txt, PNG, JPEG etc.) into the HTML5 terminal even after blocking the sites in 'chrome://settings/cookies'
Note: Issue able to reproduce in ash-chrome and lacros Issue seems to be regression as issue worked fine in M111 stable 111.0.5563.152/15329.63.0 on lava(coral) device Attached the screencast for the reference Issue related to Fullpass testcase here is the link - https://testtracker.googleplex.com/efforts/testcase/detail/343089506?tester=nyerramilli&result=&environment=

entry.title: Document render blocking: ignore elements in shadow DOM
entry.content: As per spec, elements in shadow DOM should not unblock a matching <link rel=expect>.

entry.title: Enable percent-encoded IDs in <link rel=expect>
Document render blocking: support <a name>
Regression: Cancel option is not seen at "Check Passwords" in chrome://settings/passwords
entry.content:
Chrome Version: Ash-chrome M123 Dev 123.0.6276.0/15770.0.0 on kappa(jacuzzi) device Lacros Version:Lacros Beta 123.0.6312.4 [Lacros only] OS: Chrome
Details: 1)Accounts: Test account 2)Enterprise Enrolled:NO 3)Devices: A)Non-Corp devices - kappa(jacuzzi) device -arm64/lacros32 4)Repro on Ash-chrome: yes, 123.0.6276.0 5)Mode: Normal mode 6)Frequency: Always
Enabled the lacros flags: #lacros-stability = Beta #lacros-only = Enabled
Precondition: ------------------ 1. Enable the flag #password-check. 2. Enable the flag #PasswordImport 3. User is signed in with a Gmail test account 4. Import from a file with > 500 different (fake are fine) passwords on chrome://settings/passwords.
What steps will reproduce the problem? -------------- 1. Go to chrome://settings/passwords and Click "Check Passwords" 2. Click 'Cancel' before it finishes.
What is the expected result? Cancel option should show at "check passwords"
What happens instead? Observed Cancel option is not seen at "Check Passwords" in chrome://settings/passwords
Note: Issue is seen on both ahs-chrome and lacros Issue raised for tracking purpose as this issue is related to FP testcase Issue seems to be regression as issue worked fine in M111 stable 111.0.5563.152/15329.63.0 on lava(coral) device Here is the TT link for the reference - https://testtracker.googleplex.com/efforts/testcase/detail/343089449?tester=nyerramilli&result=&environment=
Attached the screencast for the reference-

entry.title: WebXR immersive-ar events regression from 121 to 122 ‚Äì no touch events anymore
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem On an Android device with WebXR capabilities, 1. Go to https://uploads.needle.tools/needle-engine/tests/WebXR%20Audio/ 2. Click "Enter AR" 3. Wait for the AR reticle to appear 4. Click to place 5. Note that on Chrome 122+ you can't place anymore 6. Roll back to Chrome 121 and note you can place the scene
# Problem Description There seems to be a WebXR immersive-ar events regression from 121 to 122. Touch events do not work anymore. Before, regular "pointerdown" events were sent while in an AR session. Now, "pointerdown" events are not sent anymore. They do seem to still work on DOM-Overlay elements.
# Additional Comments Works in r121
# Summary WebXR immersive-ar events regression from 121 to 122 ‚Äì no touch events anymore
# Custom Questions #### Which component does this fall under? Not sure - I don't know
#### Does this work in other browsers? Yes - This is just a Chrome problem
# Additional Data Category: API \ Chrome Channel: Stable \ Regression: Yes

entry.title: Edit bookmark pop-up always appears in the left window in split windows when "Always Show Toolbar in Full Screen" is disabled
entry.content:
Chrome Version: 123.0.6312.2 (Official Build) canary (arm64) ee77acc178bb8175e0f0b1967d1bd0bbcc9d5a82-refs/branch-heads/6312@{#6}
OS: Mac(11.4)
Feature Bug :¬†https://issues.chromium.org/issues/326422875
Test Plan - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ED_otHAVJCpb_-5VqeO67F1673aHRO6HUwvQwxZOBjw/‚Ä®Ôøº‚Ä®
Preconditions : launching Chrome with --enable-features="ImmersiveFullscreen"‚Ä® #enable-immersive-fullscreen-toolbar from chrome://flags
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Launch Chrome and have 2 profiles 2. Open 2 profiles in separate windows 3. Disable "Always Show Toolbar in Full Screen" for both the windows 3. Select ‚ÄúTile Window to Left/Right of Screen‚Äù to split windows 5. Right click on bookmarks in both the windows and click on edit 6. Observe that the edit bookmark pop-up always appears in the left window 7. Now repeat the same process by disabling "Always Show Toolbar in Full Screen" for both the windows 8. Observe that the edit bookmark pop-up appears in the corresponding windows
Actual Result : Edit bookmark pop-up always appears in the left window
Expected Result : Edit bookmark pop-up must be shown in the corresponding windows
Kindly refer the screencast below
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NaMlWnSyWNtoQ2DlDFLRNZBHbZc0ldiY/view?usp=drive_link
@bur : Could you please look into this.
Thanks!

entry.title: WebView renderer crashes when printing certain characters to PDF - 121.0.6167.178
entry.content:
This template is for filing bugs against Android System WebView. Chrome bugs should be filed at https://crbug.com/wizard.
Android device name: Pixel 6a & Pixel 8 Pro
Android OS version: 6a: 14 - Build UQ1A.240205.002 8Pro: 14 - Build UQ1A.240205.004
Android System WebView version: (Settings > Apps > the 3 dots in the upper right > Show system. On Android N (7.x) through P (9.0), please include Chrome's version. Otherwise, look for "Android System WebView")
121.0.6167.178
Steps to reproduce:
1. Build & run attached Android Studio project. 2. Tap 'Print'
Expected result: The webview content should be converted to PDF and ready for printing.
Actual result: The renderer crashes.
Did this work before? (last working WebView version, or N/A)
Last working version is unknown, however it is working with: Android System Webview Beta: 123.0.6312.3 Android System Webview Dev: 124.0.6315.0
The sample project uses the üíª icon to reproduce the issue but other emoji and combinations of emoji have been seen to cause the issue such as: üêÆüáßüá∑ ---
It's especially helpful if you can capture a bug report right after you experience the bug, and attach it here. See https://developer.android.com/studio/debug/bug-report for instructions.
Screen recordings can also be very helpful - see https://developer.android.com/studio/command-line/adb#screenrecord. Please enable "Show taps" in developer settings.

entry.title: since last update the height of an layout is overridden
entry.content:
Would be appreciated if this will be handled with high priority, since we are using this in productive with many customer clients.
Since the last Chromium Update (stable channel) from v121 to v122 our page to show Dashboards seems corrupt, in fact you cannot read any data from the statistics because the auto adjusted height seems to be overridden. First the issue was found on surfing with Microsoft Edge which also uses the Chromium engine, now the same issue with the latest Chrome version. One workaround can be to use the old Internet Explorer mode within Edge, so in this compatibility mode the view looks alright for the site. It was running alright for years, so we find this weird how an browser update can destroy such a stable running site.
How to reproduce the issue: 1. Visit http://mobileaudits.de/DashboardReporting/eLPA%20Audit%20Planning?editKey=E1SKD 2. Enter with the credentials which I configured for this testing purpose. username: test / Password: test9 3. See how the height is overwritten, compared to how it should look like (comparison screenshots attached).
For any questions and tips I'm happy to answer.

entry.title: Avoid using mainController.browserProviderInterface in SettingsAppInterface
Avoid using mainController.browserProviderInterface in PermissionsAppInterface
Avoid using mainController.browserProviderInterface in InfobarManagerAppInterface
CFI + disabled Runtime Call Stats cause incorrect runtime calls
entry.content:
This is forked out of https://crbug.com/327085705.
After https://crrev.com/c/5296143, enabling CFI + disabling Runtime Call Stats leads to a miscompile in `Builtin_RunMicrotasks` that causes wrong runtime functions to be called, `Runtime_PromiseHookAfter` instead of `Runtime_PromiseHookBefore`. Adding a non-sensical line of code to `Isolate::OnPromiseBefore` repairs the confusion.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Check out V8 on https://crrev.com/c/5296143 1. Build with the following gn flags (a reduced version of official builds on release branches): ``` dcheck_always_on = false is_debug = false is_cfi = true use_cfi_icall = true use_remoteexec = true chrome_pgo_phase = 0 v8_symbol_level = 2 v8_enable_runtime_call_stats = false ``` 3. Run `./tools/run-tests.py --outdir=./out/x64.official mjsunit/async-hooks/execution-order`
The test crashes because `Runtime_PromiseHookBefore` isn't called.
